revised_title: Formation of Vortices from a Surface of Discontinuity: A Numerical Approach
tldr: This article investigates the formation of vortices from a surface of discontinuity using a numerical method. The authors replace the continuous distribution of vorticity with isolated vortices along the trace of the surface and follow their paths using a step-by-step numerical method. The results show that the effect of instability on a surface of discontinuity is to produce concentrations of vorticity at equal intervals along the surface, leading to the formation of vortices.
